Posts.Content: I'm new to the site and read these posts with great interest because of my painful veins. I have had 6 FECs and my arm is painful and tight with corded veins front and back. Hoping they'll recover! However, it is worth it to zap those rogue cells and I'm so glad chemo over. brief respite before rads in. New year.
Posts.Title: collapsing veins in chemo arm!
